app_description.message: Strips away clutter like buttons, background images, and changes the page's text size, contrast and layout for better readability

app_ui_btn_next.message: move to the next page (Meta + Right Arrow Key)

app_ui_btn_prev.message: move to the previous page (Meta + Left Arrow Key)

app_ui_btn_site_gd.message: On our site you can save article on your Google drive

app_ui_btn_site_pc.message: On our site you can save article on your Computer

app_ui_notify_wrong_content.message: Sorry the original content is not accessible anymore. Please load the origin content and retry

options_opt1.message: Show "printing button" in the reader view

options_opt10.message: Automatically switch to the fullscreen mode

options_opt12.message: User styles for the actual reader-view

options_opt15.message: Open links in the reader view mode

options_opt2.message: Show "save button" in the reader view

options_opt3.message: Show "fullscreen button" in the reader view

options_opt4.message: Show "speech button" in the reader view

options_opt5.message: Show "toggle images button" in the reader view

options_opt6.message: Show "navigation buttons" in the reader view

options_opt7.message: Show "Open in Reader View" context-menu item (restart required) (requires chrome.tabs permission)

options_opt8.message: Show "Open in background Reader View" context-menu item (restart required) (requires chrome.tabs permission)

options_opt9.message: Show "Switch to Reader View" context-menu item (restart required)
